      java.util.List<Role> RoleServiceImpl.assignRolesToUser(java.lang.String assignerId, java.lang.String userId, java.util.List<Role> roles)
      Access is checked userId is validated against DB, exception is thrown if found none only roles which exist in DB and currently not possessed by user are updated in DB.
